title: 'Sharpiegate' - Hurricane Dorian Map Altered with Sharpie
summary: Trump falsely claimed Alabama was in Hurricane Dorian's path. National Weather Service corrected him. Instead of admitting error, Trump displayed official NOAA map altered with black Sharpie extending hurricane path to Alabama. White House pressured federal weather experts to validate false claim.
keyFacts: September 1, 2019: Tweeted Alabama would 'most likely be hit (much) harder than anticipated'
National Weather Service Birmingham immediately corrected: 'Alabama will NOT see any impacts from #Dorian'
Trump displayed official NOAA map in Oval Office altered with black Sharpie
White House pressured federal weather experts to validate Trump's incorrect claim
Boston Globe: Demonstrated his 'authoritarian need to manipulate the truth'
Dangerous: Could cause confusion about actual storm path, endanger lives

sources.text: CNN: Washington Post: Trump was the one who altered Dorian trajectory map with Sharpie
NPR: Sharpiegate Blossoms Into A Full-Fledged Political Crisis
NBC News: The Sharpie is mightier: Trump mocked after that map of Dorian's path
